title: Luxe Lake District Stay with Nightly Five-Course Dinner
description: Discover the beauty of England’s UNESCO World Heritage-listed Lake District for yourself with a stay at Lodore Falls Hotel & Spa. Unrivalled romance awaits with beautiful lakeside views, lazy strolls and a luxurious spa, complete with champagne bar and lake-facing treatment rooms. Included in your stay is daily breakfast, a nightly sumptuous five-course dinner, free walking boot hire and more.
offer_address: Lodore Falls Hotel,  Borrowdale Valley,  Keswick,  Cumbria. CA12 5UX  Keswick, Cumbria CA12 5UX

vendor_name: Low Wood Bay Resort and Spa
title: Boutique England Escape in Lake District with Daily Breakfast & GBP50 Dining or Spa Credit
description:
English countryside charms, picturesque lake views, a world-class spa and unrivalled luxury await on the dreamy shores of the largest lake in England, Lake Windermere.

Perfectly situated in the heart of rolling hills with quaint Lakeland hamlets nearby, the lavish resort boasts a lakefront marina, elegantly appointed rooms and exquisite furnishings, striking an attractive picture in this UNESCO World Heritage Site. Alleviate all your stress with restorative treatments and thermal journey packages at The Spa, winner of the ‘Five Bubble Luxury' award, or enjoy relaxing in the indoor or outdoor infinity pools overlooking the lake.

When hunger strikes, tuck into seasonal British and continental delicacies at The W, and relish wood-fired grill delights like aged steaks, meats and vegetables at Blue Smoke at Low Wood Bay. If you're keen on a literary experience, Romantic poet William Wordsworth and Beatrix Potter's houses are within a short drive, plus a host of watersport activities like canoeing, kayaking and waterskiing are available onsite.
offer_address: Ambleside Road, Windermere LA23 1LP, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Low Wood Bay Resort and Spa
title: Picturesque Stay on Lake Windemere with Relaxing Two-Hour Spa Experience
description: Treat yourself to a secluded lakeside stay at Low Wood Bay Resort & Spa in the UK’s stunning Lake District. Enjoy exceptional views over tranquil Lake Windemere, with a complimentary room upgrade, daily breakfast, one romantic dinner for two, a bottle of prosecco on arrival and a two-hour thermal experience at the on-site spa included.

title: Secluded Stay in England’s Stunning Lake District
description: Experience the secluded beauty of England’s Lake District at Inn on the Lake. Commanding one of the area’s most sought-after locations, this tranquil retreat offers views over Lake Ullswater and the magnificent Helvellyn mountain range. Your picturesque getaway includes an automatic upgrade to a Fell View Room looking out over the mountains, a spectacular five-course dinner on one night of your stay, daily breakfast and a lake cruise for two.
offer_address: Inn on the Lake, Glenridding CA11 0PE Cumbria United Kingdom
